mapper.select: SELECT A.FLOOR_CD, A.CENTER_CD, B.CENTER_NM, A.FLOOR_INFO, A.FLOOR_MAP1, A.FLOOR_MAP2, A.FLOOR_NM, A.FLOOR_SEAT_CNT, A.USE_YN, A.FLOOR_PART_DVSN, A.FLOOR_SEAT_RULE, B.FLOOR_INFO FLOOR_INFO_CNT, A.FRST_REGIST_DTM, A.FRST_REGTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_DTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, C.CODE_DC FROM TSEB_FLOOR_INFO_M A, TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.FLOOR_CD = #{floorCd} AND A.CENTER_CD = B.CENTER_CD AND A.FLOOR_INFO = C.CODE
SELECT A.FLOOR_CD, A.FLOOR_NM FROM TSEB_FLOOR_INFO_M A, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.CODE = A.FLOOR_INFO AND A.CENTER_CD = #{centerCd} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(B.CODE_DC) ASC
